element.definition: A  reference to another resource (usually another Observation) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.
element.comment: For a discussion on the ways Observations can assembled in groups together see [Notes below](observation.html#4.20.4).
element.requirements: Normally, an observation will have either a value or a set of related observations. A few observations (e.g. Apgar score) may have both a value and a set of related observations or sometimes a QuestionnaireResponse from which the measure is derived.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
